name: CHC Digital
description:
We have worked with some of the world's prominent brands from all over the globe, transformed online business whilst winning some of the industry's most prestigious awards. The world is filling up with boring digital solutions that have spiralling costs with no guarantee on ROI. Wouldn't it be nice if your digital space put a smile on your face? CHC has stopped the clock on costs and only work on flat fees. Delivering inventive and playful solutions that work hard for you.
Our mission is to develop the next generation of digital pioneers who will continue to produce work that leaves you feeling like a kid playing with a new toy. Founded by Harrison Williams in the pursuit of this dream, CHC Digital has grown from the energy of the people who share it.
